name: The Nameless Avatar (DEMO)
description:
A short bullet hell game in which you pit your avatar against Naudiz, the avatar of DOGSDAY (in other words, me).

There isn't much to say about this. It's a single-level Touhou-like shooter game with a rank system. I'll add more to this later.

Currently, there's a demo available. It's definitely not 100% polished, mind you, and there are still some placeholders scattered about.

Oh well, such is the game jam life.
